name: Prototype - Can Do Kingdom
description:
==Controls==
WASD or Left Stick to move
E on keyboard, or X on controller to interact
Spacebar or mouse or A on Controller to interact with dialog and jump

Talk to the guy in the house to start a quest!

Also walking the dog may soft lock the game in some dialog, because physics

This was a project a started with a few friends that never really went anywhere because life and stuff. This contains what was worked out so far. It was going to be a Paper Mario inspired narrative game about adventures in the Can Do Kingdom.
